####
linkhub.py
####
linkhub 1.0.0

링크인증 API for Python.

* requirements
 
  * Python 2.6+

************
Installation
************

Install via pip:

::

    $ pip install linkhub

Install from source:

::

    $ git clone git://github.com/linkhub-sdk/linkhub.py.git
    $ cd linkhub.py
    $ python setup.py install
